metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3753 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: WebKit in Apple Safari before 6.2.8, 7.x before 7.1.8, and 8.x before8.0.8, as used in iOS before 8.4.1 and other products, does not properlyperform taint checking for CANVAS elements, which allows remote attackersto bypass the Same Origin Policy and obtain sensitive image data byleveraging a redirect to a data:image resource.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
